title: VicunaNER: Zero/Few-shot Named Entity Recognition using Vicuna. (arXiv:2305.03253v1 [cs.CL])
abstract: Large Language Models (LLMs, e.g., ChatGPT) have shown impressive zero- and few-shot capabilities in Named Entity Recognition (NER). However, these models can only be accessed via online APIs, which may cause data leak and non-reproducible problems. In this paper, we propose VicunaNER, a zero/few-shot NER framework based on the newly released open-source LLM -- Vicuna. VicunaNER is a two-phase framework, where each phase leverages multi-turn dialogues with Vicuna to recognize entities from texts. We name the second phase as Re-Recognition, which recognizes those entities not recognized in the first phase (a.k.a. Recognition). Moreover, we set entity correctness check dialogues in each phase to filter out wrong entities. We evaluate VicunaNER's zero-shot capacity on 10 datasets crossing 5 domains and few-shot capacity on Few-NERD. translated_title: VicunaNER: 使用Vicuna进行零/小样本命名实体识别
translated_abstract: 大型语言模型（LLMs，例如ChatGPT）在命名实体识别（NER）中展现出了令人印象深刻的零/小样本能力。然而，这些模型只能通过在线API访问，这可能会导致数据泄漏和无法重现的问题。本文提出了基于新发布的开源LLM--Vicuna的零/小样本NER框架VicunaNER。VicunaNER是一个两阶段框架，其中每个阶段利用多轮与Vicuna的对话从文本中识别实体。我们将第二阶段命名为重新识别，它识别第一阶段（即识别）中未识别的实体。此外，我们在每个阶段设置实体正确性检查对话框以过滤错误实体。我们在涉及5个领域的10个数据集上评估了VicunaNER的零样本能力和Few-NERD的小样本能力。实验结果表明，VicunaNER在两种情况下均取得了优越的性能。此外，我们对VicunaNER进行了全面的研究。
tldr: 本文提出了基于Vicuna的零/小样本NER框架VicunaNER，具有优异的零样本和小样本能力，并在多个数据集上进行了评估和全面的研究。
en_tdlr: This paper proposes a zero/few-shot NER framework, VicunaNER, based on the open-source LLM Vicuna, which demonstrates superior performance in NER tasks across various datasets and domains. VicunaNER conducts a two-phase approach and utilizes multi-turn dialogues with Vicuna to recognize entities and applies correctness check dialogues to filter out wrong entities.
